blue light from computer screens tablets
and smartphones stop your brain
producing a sleep hormone called
melatonin and so in the hour before you
go to bed avoid using these devices or
turn the screen brightness down or wear

asleep try to fall asleep on your right

better for your heart unless you're

asleep on your left either way try to
avoid sleeping on your front or back
actively trying to stay awake actually

asleep when you start to fall asleep the

warm feet increases the rate of flow and
so helps you nod off and so next time
